feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: Aella, an independent researcher designs a giant survey about kinks

link.title: Aella, an independent researcher designs a giant survey about kinks

entry.content:
Post 200967 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: After further assessment of flags and user feedback, we have found that the person behind this survey has displayed a history of racism and transphobia that we do not condone here. Not the best subject for a post on MeFi! -- travelingthyme
entry.summary: Post 200967 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: After further assessment of flags and user feedback, we have found that the person behind this survey has displayed a history of racism and transphobia that we do not condone here. Not the best subject for a post on MeFi! -- travelingthyme
